subject: Doping (Sports)
Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
California Chrome (Race Horse)
Cheating
lead_paragraph: Efforts to combat the widespread use of drugs in horse racing have been fragmented and ineffectual. Perhaps it’s time to bring in the United States Antidoping Agency.
snippet: Efforts to combat the widespread use of drugs in horse racing have been fragmented and ineffectual. Perhaps it’s time to bring in the United States Antidoping Agency.
